abilities.name: Swarm.
abilities.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

abilities.name: Spider Climb.
abilities.description: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

abilities.name: Web Sense.
abilities.description: While in contact with a web, the swarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

abilities.name: Web Walker.
abilities.description: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
